```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
FullPitchData %>%
  ggplot() %>%
  geom_col(x = pitch_freqeuncy, y = pitch_type) +
  geom_text(aes(label = pitch_type), vjust = -0.5, size = 2, color = "black")
```
